name: Arcania: Case of the Missing Mage
name_original: Arcania: Case of the Missing Mage
description:
Arcania: The Case of the Missing Mage

My entry for NaNoRenO 2022. Play from the perspective of Daegal Silverman, a seasoned detective. A young mage has been kidnapped from the Royal Academy. It is up to Daegal and his promising apprentice, Arne, to solve the case.

If you liked it, leave a comment please! And if you didn't like it...leave a comment anyways :)

Story: Madog_Porter

https://madog-porter.itch.io/

Character Design and Illustrations: Lemonthunder

https://twitter.com/TopicalGarbage 

https://www.instagram.com/topical_garbage/

Background Images and Music: Open Source Assets  

Composer : Tim Reichert

Songs: Evans Full, Splatters
